author: jsdelfino
msg: Removed recursive test case from the composite sample now that it has been turned into an itest.

author: ritchiem
msg: QPID-466 Updated FieldTable to ensure no Decimal value is set that is larger than can be transmitted over AMQP.
That is a max scale value of Byte.MAX_VALUE and value of up to Integer.MAX_VALUE.
Additional tests to ensure this is the case.

author: jsdelfino
msg: Added recursive itest to the build.
